name: Puzzle Pint
description:
Puzzle Pint

Puzzle Pint is a simple hand-painted mini puzzle game.

Sometimes in the evenings I love to draw something and listen to music.

Once I decided to build a simple game from it and share to the world.

Puzzle Pint actually designed for mobile devices, but it's also playable on the desktop.

To play the game you just need a mouse.

Currently game contains 18 levels.

Build puzzle pieces into one picture and enjoy :)
